name: Tony Khan
description: Tony Alal Karim Khan is a Bangladeshi chef and hotelier. He has received awards and nominations as a chef.He has appeared as a celebrity cook on television shows.He is previously general manager and director of food and beverages

items.ingredients1: spaghetti4 oz pancetta, diced  cloves garlic minced
items.cooking_method1: Cook the spaghetti according to package directions until al dente. Reserve 1/2 cup of the pasta water and drain the rest.

items.ingredients2: 1 lb chicken breast, cubed , cloves garlic minced
items.cooking_method2: 1. Heat oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat.

items.ingredients3: 1 lb shrimp, peeled , cloves garlic minced and deveined
items.cooking_method3: 1. Cook linguine pasta in a large pot of salted boiling water until al dente.
